remarks: A homotopy evaluated at its endpoints.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ishtpy.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
ishtpy.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
ishtpy.4 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
htpyi.1 $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( F ( J Htpy K ) G ) ) $.
htpyi $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A H 0 ) = ( F ` A ) /\ ( A H 1 ) = ( G ` A ) ) ) $.
